page.title: 17A Typical Day
page.content: My name is Charlotte Goodey.I am 8 years old.My mum wakes me up at 7.30am.Then I go downstairs and have my breakfast.After breakfast I clean my teeth, brush my hair and make my bed.I leave for school at 8.20am.I go in dad's ford sierra.We get the paper.Sometimes the doors are locked at school.The first thing I do when I get in is project.Then we have regist- ration.After that we have to line up for assembly.One of our teachers told us about the Bible.Then we do maths or language in our classroom.Then we get our swimming kit and crisps.We wait by the swimming pool.I can swim a length. For lunch I have sandwiches,chocolate bicuits and fruit.We paint or make puppets in the afternoon and have story.When I get home I play or watch television.We have tea.I make coffee before bedtime at 8.30pm.
